sentence.Network_en: We had to admire his prowess as an oarsman / his rowing prowess.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们不能不佩服他那了不起的划桨本领.

sentence.Network_en: The oarsman found that the he had to pull against the tide.
sentence.Network_cn: 划桨者发现他必须逆水划船.

sentence.Network_en: The oarsman was feathering through the turbulent waves.
sentence.Network_cn: 划桨者正平掠过汹涌的波浪.
